definition: a tool for tamping (e.g., for tamping tobacco into a pipe bowl or a charge into a drill hole etc.), press down tightly
details:
noun
- a tool for tamping (e.g., for tamping tobacco into a pipe bowl or a charge into a drill hole etc.)
= synonyms: tamper, tamping bar
verb
- press down tightly
= example: press down tightly
= synonyms: pack
